controllers.GestionnairesUnivers

Class BaseGestionnaireUnivers

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GestionnairesUnivers.BaseGestionnaireUnivers
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GestionnaireMedieval, GestionnaireWestern

    public abstract class BaseGestionnaireUnivers
extends Object
    The universe controller, which defines methods wrapping Personnage that will then get called by CRUDPersonnage.

      • BaseGestionnaireUnivers

    • Method Detail

      • confier

        public String confier(Chef chef,
                      Soldat soldat)
        Associates a chef to a given soldier (using Soldat.setChef(Chef)). And append the soldier to the chef's subordinated soldiers list (see Chef.ajouterSoldat(Soldat)). The association can fail (death of one of the targets), which triggers a custom message (if any).
        Parameters:
        chef - The chief that will receive a new soldier under their orders.
        soldat - The soldier to associate the chef to.
        Returns:
        The universe's custom message, if any. Depending on the success or the failure from an invalid move.

      • creerChef

        public Chef creerChef(int id,
                      String nom,
                      String qualificatif,
                      int force)
        Wraps a inherited Chef constructor, allowing to define which derived Chef to use. Instead uncleanly using and passing a Class's reflection around.
        Parameters:
        id - The chef's identifier.
        nom - The chef's names.
        qualificatif - The chef's full name prefix.
        force - The chef's hitting force, if any. May not be supported by the current universe.
        Returns:
        The created chef's instance.

      • creerSoldat

        public Soldat creerSoldat(int id,
                          String nom,
                          int force)
        Wraps a inherited Soldat constructor, allowing to define which derived Soldat to use. Instead uncleanly using and passing a Class's reflection around.
        Parameters:
        id - The soldier's identifier.
        nom - The soldier's names.
        force - The soldier's hitting force.
        Returns:
        The created soldier's instance.

      • donnerCoup

        void donnerCoup(Personnage agresseur,
                Personnage victime)
         throws SourceMorteException,
                CibleMorteException
        Throws any invalid moves (exceptions) that could occur. Then, the message and throws can get customize depending by frapper(models.Personnage, models.Personnage) depending on the current universe.
        Parameters:
        agresseur - The character that wants to hit someone.
        victime - The character that is or may be going to get hit, if the move is possible.
        Throws:
        SourceMorteException - Whenever the attacker is dead.
        CibleMorteException - Whenever the attacked is dead.

      • exhorter

        public abstract String exhorter(Chef chef)
        Makes the chef exhort themselves. Must be implemented by the derived classes with a custom message.
        Parameters:
        chef - The chef to exhort.
        Returns:
        The chef's exhort message.

      • frapper

        public abstract String frapper(Personnage agresseur,
                               Personnage victime)
        Wraps and handles exceptions from donnerCoup(models.Personnage, models.Personnage)
        Parameters:
        agresseur - The character that is attacking.
        victime - The character that is getting attacked.
        Returns:
        Whatever message to show if that's an invalid move or a success.

      • getDegats

        public int getDegats(Personnage personnage,
                     Personnage victime)
        Retrieves and simulate the character's total damage force.
        Parameters:
        personnage - The attacker.
        victime - The attacked.
        Returns:
        The character's total damage force.

      • getNomChef

        public abstract String getNomChef(Chef chef)
        Retrieves the descriptive display name of a chef.
        Parameters:
        chef - The chef to get the name from.
        Returns:
        The descriptive display name of a chef.

      • getNomSoldat

        public abstract String getNomSoldat(Soldat soldat)
        Retrieves the descriptive display name of a soldier.
        Parameters:
        soldat - The soldier to get the name from.
        Returns:
        The descriptive display name of a soldier.

      • presenterChef

        public abstract String presenterChef(Chef chef)
        A suffix presentation for a chef.
        Parameters:
        chef - The chef to present.
        Returns:
        the presentation suffix of the chef.

        Returns:
        the presentation suffix of the soldier.

      • seFaireFrapper

        public void seFaireFrapper(Personnage victime,
                           int degats)
                    throws CibleMorteException
        The base definition for receiving a hit from a given source. This will reduce the character's life by the source's damage count.
        Parameters:
        victime - The character that is getting hit.
        degats - The total life to remove from the target.
        Throws:
        CibleMorteException - Happens when this character is dead, they can no longer be hit, once dead.

      • sePresenter

        public String sePresenter(Personnage personnage)
        The base introduction of a character. This returns the following base format: {id}:\t{full_name} ma vie est de {remaining_life} In addition, it shows the character's force, if any (non-zero and positive).
        Parameters:
        personnage - The character to summarize.
        Returns:
        The character's base introduction text.
        See Also:
        Personnage.getId(), Personnage.getVie(), Personnage.getNom(), getNomChef(Chef), getNomSoldat(Soldat)
